ygData.subject: Re: Eruds Tonic In possesion!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found the secret to Erud s Tonic myself and I kick myself because I buy all Lore Items (even if I dont know what they are for) So I sitting in Greater
ygData.messageBody:
I have found the secret to Erud's Tonic myself and I kick myself because
I buy all Lore Items (even if I dont know what they are for) So I
sitting in Greater Faydark with a "kiss", maybe I'll drink it ;) BTW I
am going to find out where this quest leads, I want to turn in the Orges
head since you dont get a brewing book for the quest.

One more thing Mushin mentions a great and wonderful quest (heck I
thought I was in the middle of the biggest (think about it, its a Quest,
that needs a quest reward item, in order to get you need to do 2 quests
inside of that one and piss off a God, also you need 2 people, because
could you ever see an Orge in Erudian "kissing the bookworm" or and
Erudite in the Orge home city?))

Mushin wrote:

> I have Eruds Tonic in my posession! I would hate to spoil this
> one for you so I will let you mull over it for a few days.
